word:
The great conflict now being waged is not merely a strife of man against man. 
                                                                           975
On one side stands the Prince of life, acting as man's substitute and surety; on the other, the prince of darkness, with the fallen angels under his command [Ephesians 6:12, 13, 10, 11 quoted] (RH Feb. 6, 1900).  {7BC 974.10} 
 
                           Chapter 13 

     1, 2, 11. See EGW on ch. 12:3-6, 13-17.
